bibl.title: M.W. HASLAM and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by G. BASTIANINI, H.M. COCKLE, J. LENAERTS, D. LÜHRMANN, K. TREU, E.G. TURNER and members of the Istituto G. Vitelli, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LX (Nos 4009-4092). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 80.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LX, 4009-4092. - I. Theological texts (4009-4011) - II. Euripides (4012-4017). - III. Menander (4018-4026). - IV. Aeschines (4027-4055). - V. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4056-4092).

COLES R.A., M.W. HASLAM and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by G. BASTIANINI, H.M. COCKLE, J. LENAERTS, D. LÜHRMANN, K. TREU, E.G. TURNER and members of the Istituto G. Vitelli, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LX (Nos 4009-4092). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 80.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1994, 8°, xiii-258 pp. et XII pll. ISBN 0-85698-117-6. £60.
Coles Haslam Parsons Bastianini Cockle Lenaerts Lührmann Treu Turner
